articles.author: Naomi O’Leary
articles.title: European leaders fail to persuade US to extend time in Afghanistan - The Irish Times
articles.description: European capitals fear at-risk Afghans will be left behind as Washington perseveres with August 31st withdrawal date
articles.content: European leaders failed to persuade United States president Joe Biden to keep troops at Kabul airport beyond an August 31st deadline at a meeting of the G7, leaving just days to complete evacuations … [+3786 chars]

articles.title: Rugby: Captain Sam Whitelock, Aaron Smith 'unlikely' to join All Blacks for Rugby Championship - Newshub
articles.description: The All Blacks will leave for Australia and Europe on Thursday, without two of their key players.
articles.content:
The All Blacks will likely depart for their bumper road trip to Australia and Europe without two of their key players - including their captain.
On Thursday, the squad will leave for a mammoth four-… [+910 chars]
